rule: If no model names are found or if it is not clear if there are model names, the array must contain the single string "NA".
input: While discussing neural networks, no particular model names were specified.
validityText:
The given input discusses neural networks in the context of machine learning but mentions that no particular model names were specified. According to the input specification, the text should potentially include model names but does not strictly require specific model names to be present. It should describe models, methods, or techniques relevant to machine learning research. In this input, "neural networks" are a recognized model or method relevant to the field. Thus, the text satisfies the requirement of describing a model or technique used in machine learning research. 

OK
